title: "Airbnb acquires stealth AI startup founded by a creator of Siri"
excerpt: "Airbnb (Nasdaq: ABNB) has acquired a 12-person AI startup, GamePlanner.AI, in order to use its team to flesh out and expand its AI-related services, the company announced Tuesday. According to CNBC, the deal was worth $200 million."
